entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Hot Restart feature not working after updating to VS2022 17.3 Preview 2 #8029
  • Label not getting resized to the change in Text length on Android resurfaced again in 6.0.400-preview #8028
  • Visual studio 2022 - 17.2.4 maui:/ #8027
  • Pairing to Mac not working in Visual Studio 2022 1.17.3 Preview 2 #8026
  • [Bug] Add items to the Grid after rendering the page. #8025
  • Add iOS platform-specifics for translucency to Shell #8024
  • ProgressBar on Windows has wrong animation when reducing value #8018
  • [iOS] Shell.TabBarIsVisible and Shell.NavBarIsVisible wrong behaviour if 5 Tabs and more #8017
  • [Windows] RefreshView and ContentView are not firing commands when using mouse. #8016
  • CollectionView - slow scrolling, laggy performance #8012
  • [Windows] TabbedPage inside NavigationPage TopBar fighting #8011
  • [Windows] TabbedPage inside Navigation page causes Crash #8009
  • Visual Studio for Mac 2022 17.3 Preview (17.3 build 198) - MAUI Solution and Project Name Mismatch #8008

Closed

  • Add default `Name=blazorWebView` to MAUI MainPage.xaml #8019
  • TableView Intent seems not to have any effect on layout #7998
  • Can't build Windows target anymore #8013
  • Observe changes in internal class #8005

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixup Flyout Template Parts #8022
    area/shell 🐢
  • Hook up horizontal scroll events on Android #8021
    area/layout 🔲
  • Multiple Fixes for Resizetizer (esp. Android App Icons) #8020
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Set the correct font using IsPassword property on Entry #8015
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix readonly Editor with multiple lines #8014
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [C] default Binding ctor bind to SelfPath #8010

Merged

  • Remove RC2 & Preview 14 Development Workload Installation Instructions #8006
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add default `Name=blazorWebView` to MAUI MainPage.xaml #8007
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • Fix updating Windows resources at runtime #7830
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2

Updated

  • [essentials] use Lazy<T> for Android application-wide values #7996
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0-servicing
  • [android] avoid View.Context where unecessary #8001
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping RadioButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue using DynamicResource TextColor on Label FormattedString #7793
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Explicitly set bounds for iOS ScrollView content holder #8002
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker Format not working #7991
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Fix for #5523 MauiWebView not loading local files on Windows #7672
    platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr2
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Alert on modal page #7898
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
